description:
Embrace chilly days with the Fleece Mashup jacket, a cozy and versatile addition to your wardrobe. Made from 100% recycled materials, this jacket offers lightweight micro fleece that's plush, warm, and perfect for outdoor adventures with friends. It features handwarmer pockets and abrasion-resistant overlays, making it an ideal go-anywhere choice for cooler seasons.

  • Mixed nubby and smooth-face fleece panels and reinforced in high-wear areas make this jacket ready for any adventures
  • Secure-zip chest pocket and hand pockets
  • Double-layer front, snap closure, and drop-tail hem to help stay warm
name: The North Face Fleece Mashup Jacket - Girls' - Youths
